CustomField.formula: IF(AND(Lunch_Break_Minutes__c != 0, !ISNULL(Lunch_Break_Minutes__c)), ' Includes a ' & TEXT(Lunch_Break_Minutes__c) & ' min break. ', ' ') + IF(OR( ISPICKVAL(Type__c, 'Reunion'), ISPICKVAL(Type__c, 'Breastfeeding') ), TEXT(Type__c) & ' session. ', ' ') + IF(ISPICKVAL(Specific_Attendee_Type__c, ''), ' ', TEXT(Specific_Attendee_Type__c) & '. ')
CustomField.label: Additional Information
